subject: [cc-community] Hundreds and thousands, a trailer
body:
Just wanted to give a quick heads up that we have released A Swarm of 
Angels project trailer and will have a CC-licensed remixable package 
available to download shortly.

You can get to the trailer from here http://www.aswarmofangels.com/

And we are having a countdown closing this phase of the project:
Swarm about to become thousands not hundreds
Blog post: http://www.aswarmofangels.com/2007/06/1000-the-countdown/
Video sharing code for trailer: 
http://aswarmofangels.blip.tv/file/253769/

Thanks, Matt

_______________________________________________
